chat.title: Comment
chat.message: The last note about discharge planning could be moved out of medication category to "communication" or "admit/transfer/discharge" category

chat.title: Comment
chat.message:
There are other contraindications that could be listed here such as bowel obstruction, pancytopenia, or renal failure. 


Could also note that this does not necessarily apply to spine patients, elderly, palliative or other populations
